thread.title: Julian Edelman Absolutely Ruined Morris Claiborne's Ankles
thread.title_full: Julian Edelman Absolutely Ruined Morris Claiborne's Ankles | Complex

author: Jordan Zirm
title: Julian Edelman Absolutely Ruined Morris Claiborne's Ankles
text:
If you remember ESPN's excellent show "Streetball," there was a rule that if you got dunked on or if you got crossed over to the point of no return, you had to take off your jersey and your shoes and leave the arena.
That's what should have happened to Dallas Cowboys cornerback Morris Claiborne when New England Patriots wide receiver Julian Edelman shook him so bad on the initial move off the line of scrimmage that Claiborne's ankles wobbled before he completely fell to the ground. Edelman fakes like he's going left, then darts back to the right, leaving Claiborne to chase his shadow.
You gotta go, homie.
[Via Coley Mick ]
